title: Skinny Mediterranean Pasta
directions: Boil a large pot of salted water and add pasta. Cook according to package directions.
Heat a little olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add onions and garlic and cook until tender.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Once tomatoes are heated through add drained pasta, salt,pepper and 2 oz crumbled feta.
ingredients: 2 — 14 oz cans diced tomatoes with Italian seasoning
4 oz reduced-fat tomato and herb feta cheese crumbles
